IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR STATE SHERIFFS
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE OREGON STATE SHERIFF'S ASSOCIATION IS TO PROMOTE, PROTECT, PRESERVE, ENHANCE AND SUPPORT THE OFFICE OF SHERIFF AS CONSERVATOR OF THE PEACE IN PROVIDING PUBLIC SAFETY SERVICES TO THE CITIZENS OF OREGON.
IRS990.Desc: SAFETY BELT OVERTIME GRANT TO PAY SHERIFFS' STAFF FOR OVERTIME

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DUI OVERTIME GRANT TO PAY SHERIFFS' STAFF FOR OVERTIME

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CHARITY AND COMMUNITY ACTION TO PROMOTE PUBLIC SAFETY

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: DEA GRANTS FOR DRUG AWARENESS, RESEARCH, REWARD PROGRAMS & COMMUNITY ACTION
LOBBYING HELPS PROMOTE ISSUES THAT ARE OF INTEREST TO LAW
CONFERENCES PROVIDE A NETWORKING AND EDUCATIONAL ENVIRONMENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MUSEUM COLLECTION CONSISTS OF LAW ENFORCEMENT MEMORABILIA AND ARTIFACTS. THE COLLECTION IS HELD FOR EDUCATIONAL AND HISTORICAL PURPOSES. THE ASSOCIATION HAS ESTABLISHED POLICIES WHICH SEVERELY LIMIT THE DISPOSAL OF ANY ITEM FROM THE COLLECTION. IN ADDITION, THE ASSOCIATION ONLY ACCEPTS OBJECTS FOR ITS COLLECTION WHICH HAVE HISTORICAL VALUE FOR THE LAW ENFORCEMENT PROFESSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE G, PART I, LINE 2B, COLUMN (V)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STARSET COMMUNICATIONS OF WOODSTOCK, GEORGIA IS THE FUNDRAISING COMPANY USED BY OSSA TO PROMOTE AND ENCOURAGE INDIVIDUAL, HONORARY AND BUSINESS MEMBERSHIP. ALL MAILING RESPONSES ARE RETURNED DIRECTLY TO OSSA IN BUSINESS REPLY ENVELOPES ENCLOSED IN THE STARSET COMMUNICATIONS MAILINGS. RETURNED BUSINESS REPLY ENVELOPES ARE MAILED TO THE ASSOCIATION'S U. S. POST BOX

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DUII GRANT AND SAFETY BELT GRANT FUNDS ARE AWARDED TO REQUESTING COUNTY SHERIFF OFFICES, IN ACCORDANCE WITH A BOARD OF DIRECTOR'S ALLOCATION DETERMINATION. GRANT AWARDED SHERIFF OFFICES SUBMIT MONTHLY STATISTICAL REPORTS AND REIMBURSEMENT REQUESTS TO THE OSSA. THE OSSA SUBMITS QUARTERLY REPORTS TO THE OREGON DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION SUMMARIZING THE STATISTICAL INFORMATION AND THE REIMBURSEMENT HISTORY FOR ALL PARTICIPATING SHERIFF'S OFFICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND SIGNED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PRIOR TO FILING. THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE GOVERNING BODY AT THE NEXT SCHEDULED MONTHLY BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF KEY EMPLOYEES IS REVIEWED AND EVALUATED BY THE BOARD ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE IF REQUESTED THE ASSOCIATION ALSO POSTS THEIR AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORM 990 ON THEIR WEB SITE.
